original_text: The Gentiles do not have God's Law that he gave to Moses. If Gentiles do wrong things, God will punish them. But he will not use his Law when he judges the Gentiles. But the Jews do have God's Law. So, if Jews do wrong things, God will use his Law to judge them. The Law will show that they have done wrong things.
korean_text: 무릇 율법 없이 범죄한 자는 또한 율법 없이 망하고 무릇 율법이 있고 범죄한 자는 율법으로 말미암아 심판을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: The Gentiles do not have God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 이방인들은 하나님의 율법을 가지고 있지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: But he will not use his Law
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 자신의 율법을 사용하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: But the Jews do have God's Law
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 유대인들은 하나님의 율법을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: So, if Jews do wrong things
God will use his Law to judge them
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 자신의 율법을 사용하여 그들을 심판하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The Law will show that they have done wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 율법은 그들이 잘못된 일을 했다는 것을 보여줄 것입니다
